Random Access Channel Jamming / DoS Attack¶

Implementation (UE):¶

  • Transmit a higher volume of RACH messages

  • Configure UE to transmit at a higher gain

Attack Metrics:¶

  • Inability of UEs to connect

  • Low channel quality

  • gNB overload /crash
